* Therefore, the probability of the sequence (c) WWWWH is 125/512 × 15/64 = 1875/131072.

Comparing the probabilities of the three sequences, we can see that the probability of the sequence (a) WWWH is the highest, followed by the sequence (b) WWWHH, and then the sequence (c) WWWWH.

Therefore, I would recommend betting on the sequence (a) WWWH, as it has the highest probability of occurring.
